events.name: U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Battery Critical Materials Supply Chain R&D and Workshop
events.wd_label: U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Battery Critical Materials Supply Chain R&D and Workshop
events.wd_description: This event discusses the DOE EERE's findings from an RFI and workshop focused on battery critical materials supply chain R&D, aiming to reduce greenhouse gas pollution and decarbonize the U.S. economy.
events.description: This event discusses the DOE EERE's findings from an RFI and workshop focused on battery critical materials supply chain R&D, aiming to reduce greenhouse gas pollution and decarbonize the U.S. economy.

events.name: RFI issuance
events.wd_description: The RFI was issued on June 29, 2020, to gather feedback on challenges and opportunities in the critical battery materials supply chains, focusing on raw minerals production, refining, and processing.
events.description: The RFI was issued on June 29, 2020, to gather feedback on challenges and opportunities in the critical battery materials supply chains, focusing on raw minerals production, refining, and processing.

events.name: Workshop
events.wd_description: The workshop was held in December 2020, featuring discussions on lithium, nickel, and cobalt supply security, and cathode manufacturing, aiming to create a diverse, domestic battery supply chain.
events.description: The workshop was held in December 2020, featuring discussions on lithium, nickel, and cobalt supply security, and cathode manufacturing, aiming to create a diverse, domestic battery supply chain.

events.name: Report findings
events.wd_description: The report identified major themes such as resource characterization, technology intensity, scale-up, economics, and environment, highlighting the need for R&D funding and improved connectivity across the supply chain.
events.description: The report identified major themes such as resource characterization, technology intensity, scale-up, economics, and environment, highlighting the need for R&D funding and improved connectivity across the supply chain.

events.name: Resource characterization
events.wd_description: Resource characterization focuses on understanding the nature of critical minerals and materials required for clean energy technologies.
events.description: Resource characterization focuses on understanding the nature of critical minerals and materials required for clean energy technologies.

events.name: Technology intensity
events.wd_description: Technology intensity addresses the need for validating technologies at the pilot scale and improving energy and chemical efficiency in lithium extraction.
events.description: Technology intensity addresses the need for validating technologies at the pilot scale and improving energy and chemical efficiency in lithium extraction.

events.name: Scale-up
events.wd_description: Scale-up involves increasing investment in deployment-ready technologies for separation and purification, focusing on reducing processing costs.
events.description: Scale-up involves increasing investment in deployment-ready technologies for separation and purification, focusing on reducing processing costs.

events.name: Economics
events.wd_description: Economics covers the cost considerations of capital and overall project economics, emphasizing the need for R&D funding to improve project viability.
events.description: Economics covers the cost considerations of capital and overall project economics, emphasizing the need for R&D funding to improve project viability.

events.name: Environment
events.wd_description: The environmental aspect highlights the need for sustainable practices in resource extraction and processing, addressing environmental impacts.
events.description: The environmental aspect highlights the need for sustainable practices in resource extraction and processing, addressing environmental impacts.

events.name: Strategic planning and forecasting for EERE programs
events.wd_label: Strategic planning and forecasting for EERE programs
events.wd_description: Input from the workshop will inform the development of an R&D roadmap, facilitating strategic planning and forecasting for future EERE programs.
events.description: Input from the workshop will inform the development of an R&D roadmap, facilitating strategic planning and forecasting for future EERE programs.

events.name: R&D roadmap development
events.wd_description: Developing the R&D roadmap involves identifying key areas for funding opportunities, prizes, awards, and partnerships to strengthen the battery supply chain.
events.description: Developing the R&D roadmap involves identifying key areas for funding opportunities, prizes, awards, and partnerships to strengthen the battery supply chain.

events.name: Strategic planning
events.wd_description: Strategic planning focuses on addressing risks and capitalizing on opportunities identified in the report to enhance the battery supply chain.
events.description: Strategic planning focuses on addressing risks and capitalizing on opportunities identified in the report to enhance the battery supply chain.

events.name: Forecasting
events.wd_description: Forecasting involves predicting future directions for EERE programs, including potential impacts on supply chain dynamics and industry trends.
events.description: Forecasting involves predicting future directions for EERE programs, including potential impacts on supply chain dynamics and industry trends.

events.name: Creation of a Diverse Domestic Battery Supply Chain
events.description: Emphasizes the goal of creating a diverse, domestic battery supply chain within five years.

events.name: Connectivity Across the Supply Chain
events.description: Importance of increased connectivity across the supply chain.

events.name: Strategy that Prioritizes Resource Diversification
events.description: Need for a strategy that prioritizes resource diversification to secure nickel and cobalt supply.

events.name: Funding Opportunities for Early Stage R and D and High TRL Technology Transitions
events.description: Necessity of funding for early-stage R&D and high technology readiness level (TRL) technology transitions.

events.name: Resource Purity Concerns
events.description: Concerns about resource purity, particularly with nickel and cobalt, making separation and purification challenging.

events.name: Shift Towards Nickel Rich Cathodes and Cobalt Free Chemistries
events.description: Anticipated industry shift towards nickel-rich cathodes and cobalt-free chemistries.

events.name: Development of the R and D Roadmap
events.description: Workshop input will inform the development of the R&D roadmap.

events.name: Future Directions in EERE Programs
events.description: Strategic planning and forecasting to inform future directions in EERE programs, including R&D funding opportunities.
